name: Shelled
description:
Time's spiralling through you.

In which time and place is your mind in?

A game made for the Snails #bitsyjam and proudly my first one using Bitsy, after long wanting to !

Tools used:

Bitsy Engine

Bitsy Hacks ( basic sfx, bitsymuse, paragraph-break, end-from-dialog, exit-from-dialog, directional-avatars, transparent-sprites and external-game-data)

Aseprite (all the backgrounds)

Image-to-Bitsy (exporting backgrounds from .png to bitsy tiles)

BeepBox (all the sound)
